plot: A road trip with cinematographer Dave Gaudet as he travels throughout North America, across the Maritimes, Great Plains and mountains to discover the art and history of Aboriginal peoples.
plot_en: A road trip with cinematographer Dave Gaudet as he travels throughout North America, across the Maritimes, Great Plains and mountains to discover the art and history of Aboriginal peoples.
plot_es: A road trip with cinematographer Dave Gaudet as he travels throughout North America, across the Maritimes, Great Plains and mountains to discover the art and history of Aboriginal peoples.
title: The Medicine Line
